arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} chance to create a {c_important}Mystic Circle{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Spiritborn_RuneArea."Script Formula 5"]{/c} seconds. 

Casting a {c_important}Centipede{/c} Skill in {c_important}Mystic Circles{/c} empowers them to periodically apply {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * (1 + Owner.Bonus_Percent_Per_Power#Spiritborn_RuneArea)]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds to enemies within while extending any Crowd Controls affecting them.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} chance to create a {c_important}Mystic Circle{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Spiritborn_RuneArea."Script Formula 5"]{/c} seconds. 

Casting a {c_important}Centipede{/c} Skill in {c_important}Mystic Circles{/c} empowers them to periodically apply {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * (1 + Owner.Bonus_Percent_Per_Power#Spiritborn_RuneArea)]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds to enemies within while extending any Crowd Controls affecting them.
